text: كَتَبَ ٱللَّهُ لَأَغْلِبَنَّ أَنَا۠ وَرُسُلِىٓ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ قَوِىٌّ عَزِيزٌ

translation.en.sahih: Allah has written, "I will surely overcome, I and My messengers." Indeed, Allah is Powerful and Exalted in Might.
translation.id.indonesian: Allah telah menetapkan: "Aku dan rasul-rasul-Ku pasti menang". Sesungguhnya Allah Maha Kuat lagi Maha Perkasa.
